Functions
pixel
pixel:
Brief

Draw a pixel into the framebuffer

Params
x0

framebuffer

x1

x pos

x2

y pos

w3

color

block
block:
Brief

Draw a block into the framebuffer based on the scale factor and on the provided padding

Params
x0

framebuffer

x1

x pos

x2

y pos

w3

color

x4

padding

Notes

The block coords should be choosen from 0,0 to MAX_WIDTH,MAX_HEIGHT

point
point:
Brief

Draw a block with padding=0px

Params
x0

framebuffer

x1

x pos

x2

y pos

w3

color

Notes

The point coords should be choosen from 0,0 to MAX_WIDTH,MAX_HEIGHT

x2

y min

x3

x max

x4

y max

w5

color
